title: Honey harvest
creator_credit: Western Australian Government Film Unit, Department of Agriculture Western Australia and Norman A. Uren
brief_description: Shows the gathering of honey from wildflowers. It is a seasonal activity and beekeepers move the hives to follow the honey flow throughout the state. The film depicts the extraction of honey, packing and bulk handling. Honey is loaded at Fremantle and shipped overseas. Commercial uses of honey are also indicated.
